title: Hot Dog

nouns: A small sausage popular in the United States
A sausage made from beef, chicken or pork, also a hot dog
Fully cooked sausage, traditionally grilled or steamed
Vienna sausage
A hot dog, wiener, wurst or sausage.
A hot dog is a cooked sausage, traditionally grilled or steamed and served in a sliced bun as a sandwich.
A hot dog, wiener, wurst or sausage, often cut into pieces for children.
A smooth-textured sausage of minced beef or pork usually smoked; often served on a bread roll
A hot dog or sausage.
A food consisting of a frankfurter, or wiener, in a bread roll, usually served with ketchup, mustard, relish, etc.
A length of intestine, stuffed with ground (organ) meat, and other ingredients. Instead of intestines, a different kind of wrapper can be used.
A food made of ground meat (or meat substitute) and seasoning, packed in a cylindrical casing; a length of this food.
Highly seasoned minced meat stuffed in casings
Food usually made from ground meat with a skin around it
A sausage is a food usually made from ground meat with a skin around it.
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Food.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

description: The cooked sausage of a hot dog in a sliced bun and drizzled with yellow mustard, as eaten at a baseball game.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the hot dog emoji is a mouthwatering depiction of a classic comfort food, featuring a plump sausage nestled in a soft, glossy bun with a slight sheen. Apple's characteristic 3D shading and realistic lighting give the bun a pillowy texture and the sausage a savory depth, while condiment details like mustard squiggles are rendered with precise, soft rounded edges. This delightful emoji is perfect for expressing cravings, casual dining, or enjoying a day at the ballpark, bringing a touch of playful indulgence to your messages.
